PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ACTIMALT LIQUID REGULAR is a viscous liquid syrup produced by Muntons through an enzyme-assisted hot water extraction process of barley and malted barley, followed by filtration and concentration under vacuum evaporation. This yellow-brown syrup has a pleasant characteristic cereal and malt odour, complemented by a sweet taste with a distinctive cereal and malt flavour. The product is composed primarily of soluble extracts of barley and malted barley, typically ranging from 77.1% to 79.6%, with water content between 20.4% and 22.9%. It contains gluten at a level of approximately 2,570 mg/kg. ACTIMALT LIQUID REGULAR is rich in carbohydrates, especially maltose and maltotriose sugars, providing an energy value of 300 to 320 kcal per 100 grams. It also contains small amounts of protein, fat, dietary fiber, and essential minerals such as sodium. The syrup's analytical specifications include refractometric solids between 79.5% and 82%, a pH of 5 to 6, and a color EBC value of 12 or less. Microbiological limits ensure product safety with low counts of total plate, yeasts, moulds, and coliforms. This malt extract syrup is ideal for use in food and beverage applications where a natural malt flavor and sweetness are desired, offering both functional and sensory benefits.

PRODUCT_NAME: FAMB279 N&A BROWN SUGAR TYPE FL
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: FAMB279 N&A BROWN SUGAR TYPE FL from WILD Flavors, Inc. is a light brown/tan powder designed to impart a maple brown sugar aroma and flavor. This flavoring product is composed of ingredients such as gum arabic, maltodextrin, nature identical flavor, dextrose from genetically modified corn, silicon dioxide, propylene glycol, glycerine, caramel color from genetically modified corn, and sulfites. It features a moisture content of less than 10% and a granulation size greater than 90% passing through a #20 USS sieve, ensuring a fine and consistent powder form. The product complies with the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act and is certified as generally recognized as safe (GRAS) by FEMA and approved by the FDA for use in food products. Microbiological limits are strictly controlled, with low allowable counts for coliform, E. coli, mold, yeast, and a negative requirement for Salmonella, ensuring product safety and quality. FAMB279 is suitable for ambient storage conditions between 55-75°F (13-24°C) with a recommended shelf life of 270 days in unopened containers. Its formulation and physical properties make it ideal for use in various food applications where a natural brown sugar flavor is desired, providing consistent taste and quality in finished products.
FILE_NAME: PIM000003047-8. FAMB279 BROWN SUGAR TYPE FL.pdf

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Acerola juice concentrate, clarified R=64-68, produced by SVZ Tomaszow Sp. z o.o., is a high-quality juice concentrate derived from sound and mature acerolas (Malpighia glabra L.). The acerolas are carefully selected, depectinized, filtered, and concentrated to achieve a Brix refractometer value ranging from 64.0 to 68.0, with a corrected Brix between 65.2 and 69.9. The concentrate exhibits a specific gravity of 1.320 to 1.349 and a pH level between 2.7 and 3.5, indicating its acidic nature. The product is characterized by an aromatic and typical acerola flavor, with a sweet and acidic taste profile, and visually presents an orange to yellow color. It contains a high vitamin C content, ranging from 6000 to 8000 mg/kg, and acidity measured as malic acid between 6.0 and 10.0 g/100g. The concentrate complies with pesticide residue regulations and maintains microbiological standards with total viable counts not exceeding 1000 cfu/g and yeasts and molds below 100 cfu/g. Recommended for frozen storage, the product has a shelf life of 24 months. This acerola juice concentrate is ideal for use in food and beverage applications requiring a natural source of vitamin C and a distinctive acerola flavor, offering both nutritional benefits and sensory appeal.
RECOMMENDED_HEALTH_BENEFITS: ['Anti-aging, Antioxidant, Anti-Cancer, Anti-Inflammatory', 'General Health', 'Immune system', 'Vitamins and Minerals', 'Skin, Nails, Hair']

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Accelerzyme CPG BF is a liquid carboxypeptidase (protease) preparation produced by DSM Food Specialties B.V., derived from a selected strain of Aspergillus niger. This enzyme preparation appears green in color, with the shade varying between batches, and ranges from clear to opalescent in clarity. The product is composed primarily of glycerol (54%) and enzyme solution (46%), with a protease activity of at least 900 CPGU/ml, operating optimally at a pH between 4.3 and 4.7. It is formulated to meet stringent physical, chemical, and microbiological specifications, including low heavy metal content and absence of harmful microorganisms such as Salmonella, E. coli, and Listeria monocytogenes. Accelerzyme CPG BF is kosher and halal approved, suitable for vegans and vegetarians, and produced using biotechnological techniques involving overexpression of naturally present genes in the producing microorganism. The product is supplied in 20 kg packaging and should be stored in sealed containers at 4-8 °C to maintain stability, with a shelf life of 24 months and minimal activity loss within 12 months. This enzyme preparation is designed for food industry applications requiring protease activity, offering reliable performance and compliance with international food safety standards.

Apple juice concentrate from AUSTRIA JUICE GmbH is a high-quality product made by physically removing water from apple juice obtained from pressing sound and ripe apples. This concentrate appears as a typical, clear, golden-yellow, viscous liquid with a flavor and taste characteristic of fresh apples. It complies with stringent European regulations, including Directive 2012/12/EU, AIJN Code of Practice, and various EU regulations ensuring no allergens, GMOs, heavy metals, mycotoxins, or pesticide residues beyond permitted limits. The concentrate has a soluble solids content of approximately 70 °Bx, total acidity as malic acid around 2.25%, and a pH value near 3.6, ensuring a balanced taste and stability. Its juice strength is about 11.2 °Bx, with low turbidity and controlled absorption at 440 nm, indicating clarity and quality. Microbiological standards are strictly maintained, with low counts of viable microorganisms, yeasts, and molds, ensuring safety and shelf life of up to 6 months when stored at 4-6 °C. This apple juice concentrate is ideal for use in beverage production, food processing, and culinary applications where authentic apple flavor and high-quality concentrate are required.
FILE_NAME: PIM000007436-Specification_1101103010101_Apple juice concentrate_Austria Juice Standard - Stock quality - Medium acidity.pdf

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: EXTER 100 - Bouillon is a typical savoury soy liquid characterized by sweet and caramelized notes, presenting a rich bouillon, meaty, and salty flavor profile. This product is a brown liquid with a water content of 63.0% and salt content of 16.0% (as NaCl), providing 355 kJ (85 kcal) per 100 grams. It is designed for versatile culinary applications, including use in salads at 0.50 - 1.50% and meatballs at 1.00 - 2.00% dosage levels by weight of the finished product. The product is microbiologically safe, with strict limits on total plate count, yeast, molds, Enterobacteriaceae, and absence of Salmonellae. EXTER 100 - Bouillon is Halal certified, Kosher suitable, and vegetarian-friendly, making it suitable for diverse dietary needs. It conforms to sensory standards when diluted to a 4.00% solution in hot water. For optimal quality, it should be stored dry at ambient temperatures between 6-25°C and has a shelf life of 24 months under these conditions. Packaged in 1200 kg IBC containers, this bouillon liquid is ideal for enhancing the flavor of various food products, offering a convenient and consistent seasoning solution for food manufacturers and culinary professionals.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE:
Salads: 0.50 - 1.50 %
Meat balls: 1.00 - 2.00 %
General recommended dosage level is: 0.50 - 2.00 % by weight of finished product.

APPLICATIONS: ['Bread, Cakes & Pastries, Frozen Dough', 'Dairy', 'Desserts & Ice Cream', 'Processed Food', 'Sweet Snack']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC is a free flowing powder ranging in color from off white to yellowish, composed primarily of pure refined Agar, a natural polysaccharide extracted from various types of red seaweed, mainly Gelidium and Gracilaria. This product serves as a gelling and stabilizer agent specifically designed for food applications. Manufactured in compliance with current organic legislation (Nº834/2007) and certified by the control body COPAE (Organic producer code: 0073I), ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC offers a soft gel-like texture that becomes viscous when stirred, with a very high water retention capacity that enhances product shelf-life. It exhibits low viscosity in hot solutions and provides smooth, uniform, and creamy textures in milk-based systems, preventing fat and whey separation, improving spreading properties, and enhancing flavor release and mouthfeel. Additionally, it can be used as a fat replacer. The product gels independently without additives, though its gelling capacity decreases with lower pH and higher temperatures, so acidic ingredients should be added below 80°C. It is standardized with organic maltodextrin as needed and complies with strict purity specifications according to EU standards, ensuring safety and quality. ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC is ideal for diverse food industry uses, offering reliable performance as a natural, organic gelling and stabilizing agent.
FILE_NAME: PIM000009406-Rokoagar LS ORGANIC - Food Applications Eng - E01.pdf

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: APPLE FLAVOUR NPC1917M is a liquid flavouring product manufactured by Matrix Flavours & Fragrances Sdn Bhd, characterized by a sweet fuji apple profile. It appears as a colorless to yellowish liquid with a refractive index ranging from 1.42000 to 1.44000 at 20°C and a specific gravity between 1.00900 and 1.02900 at 27°C. The product is composed primarily of propylene glycol (E1520) and nature identical flavouring substances, blended and mixed into a liquid carrier to achieve a homogenized formulation. This flavour does not support microbiological growth due to its significant solvent and aromatic chemical content. It is suitable for use in confectionery, bakery, and beverage applications at concentrations between 0.1% and 0.5%. The product is halal certified by JAKIM, free from allergens and GMOs, and complies with Malaysian food regulations. Packaged in HDPE containers of 5, 20, or 25 kg, it should be stored tightly closed, away from light, under dry conditions at temperatures between 20° and 35°C, with a shelf life of 24 months. APPLE FLAVOUR NPC1917M offers a reliable, food-grade apple flavouring solution ideal for enhancing the sensory appeal of various food and beverage products.

Pre-gelatinized organic chickpeas flour is a fine powder with a yellow to light brown color, derived from organic chickpeas sourced from Italy and Argentina and produced and packed in Italy by Naturis. This flour is pre-gelatinized, meaning it has been precooked to enhance its instant solubility and thickening properties, making it highly suitable for instant sauces, soups, purees, hummus, and as a thickener in various culinary applications. It boasts a high protein content of 22.3 g per 100 g, along with significant dietary fiber (22.5 g), moderate fats (7.1 g), and carbohydrates (40.8 g), supporting dietary formulations and vegetarian or vegan diets. The product complies with stringent EC and Italian regulations regarding safety, mycotoxins, heavy metals, pesticides, and organic certification, and is free from GMOs, nanoparticles, and ionizing radiation. It is packaged in 25 kg multi-ply kraft paper bags with valves and has a shelf life of 12 months when stored in cool, dry conditions away from sunlight. The flour exhibits a peak viscosity between 7000 and 8000 cP and a final viscosity of 11000 to 12000 cP at a pasting temperature above 80°C, indicating excellent thickening and stability characteristics. It is Halal and Kosher certified and suitable for various vegetarian diets, with no allergens present in the product itself, although it is manufactured in a plant that also processes cereals containing gluten. Overall, this pre-gelatinized organic chickpeas flour offers a natural, nutritious, and versatile ingredient ideal for enhancing texture and nutritional value in food products.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Apple Juice Concentrate from WILD is a high-quality fruit concentrate made solely from apple juice concentrate, ensuring a pure and natural product. It is characterized by a refractometric Brix value of around 70 °Bx, indicating a high sugar content and concentrated flavor profile. The concentrate has a total acidity calculated as citric acid ranging between 0.90 and 2.50 g/100g, with a pH value between 3.0 and 4.0, providing a balanced tartness typical of fresh apples. Microbiologically, it maintains very low levels of lactic acid and acetic acid bacteria, yeasts, and molds, ensuring product safety and stability. Nutritionally, it offers 302 kcal per 100 g, with carbohydrates predominantly from natural sugars (66.1 g), minimal protein (0.4 g), and negligible fat and salt content. The product is free from genetically modified organisms and common allergens, making it suitable for a wide range of dietary needs. It is recommended to store the concentrate under ambient, refrigerated, or frozen conditions to maintain quality, with shelf lives of 90, 270, and 365 days respectively. Ideal for use in beverage production, culinary applications, and food manufacturing, this concentrate delivers authentic apple flavor and sweetness, enhancing the sensory profile of juices, smoothies, desserts, and other food products. WILD's Apple Juice Concentrate is a versatile ingredient that supports clean-label formulations and meets stringent European food safety regulations.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Apple Pomace fine milled from Döhler GmbH is a finely milled powder derived from the pomace of de-juiced apples. This beige powder retains the characteristic apple odor and taste, making it a natural and flavorful ingredient. It consists primarily of apple pomace, with a particle size where 90-100% passes through a 0.2 mm sieve, and has a maximum residual moisture content of 10%. The product is free from allergens such as gluten, nuts, soy, and dairy, and contains no genetically modified organisms (GMO), complying with European food law and labeling regulations. Nutritionally, it provides 247 kcal per 100 g, with 3.8 g fat, 17.1 g carbohydrates (including 12.4 g sugars), 61.4 g fiber, 5.5 g protein, and 25,000 mg salt (calculated from sodium content). It has a shelf life of 360 days when stored at 20°C with a maximum relative humidity of 65%. Microbiological limits ensure safety with maximum counts for aerobic mesophilic bacteria (1000 cfu/g), yeast and molds (500 cfu/g each), and absence of Salmonella in 25 g. This product is ideal for use in food and beverage applications where natural apple flavor and fiber enrichment are desired, offering a clean-label, allergen-free, and non-GMO ingredient option.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Organic quick cooking kamut from Naturis is a cooked and dehydrated organic kamut product presented in the form of yellow grains with the typical taste and smell of kamut. It is composed solely of organic kamut sourced from Canada and produced and packed in Italy. This product is designed for convenience, offering quick cooking properties that make it ideal for use in ready meals, salads, soups, and potages. Packaged in paper bags with an internal HDPE layer and closure valve or polypropylene big bags, it ensures freshness and compliance with stringent EC and Italian packaging regulations. The product is free from GMOs, nanoparticles, and ionizing radiation treatment, and it meets strict EC standards for mycotoxins, heavy metals, and pesticides. It is suitable for a wide range of dietary preferences including vegan, halal, kosher, and various vegetarian diets. With a shelf life of 12 months when stored in a cool, dry place away from sunlight, this organic quick cooking kamut offers a nutritious option rich in proteins, carbohydrates, dietary fibers, and healthy fats, making it a versatile and health-conscious ingredient for diverse culinary applications.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Flat-leaf Parsley from Darégal is a high-quality dried herb product made from freshly cut, washed, and dried flat-leaf parsley (Petroselinum sativum Hoffm.) originating from France. The product features a uniform green color and retains the characteristic odor and taste of fresh parsley, offering an authentic and natural flavor. It is available in a wide range of cut sizes, including extra large, large, medium, and fine, with particle sizes tailored to various culinary applications. The dried texture ensures ease of use and long shelf life, with a water content below 7%. Darégal's Flat-leaf Parsley is guaranteed microbiologically safe, free from GMOs, additives, and ionization, and complies with strict European regulations on pesticides, contaminants, and packaging materials. It is suitable for vegan and vegetarian diets and is eco-responsible, providing an economical alternative to fresh parsley. The product is ideal for enhancing the visual appeal and flavor of meals, salads, soups, and sauces, usable in both cold and hot culinary preparations. Packaging consists of sewn Kraft paper bags with sealed polyethylene lining, ensuring product integrity and traceability. Nutritionally, it offers significant dietary fiber and protein content, making it a valuable ingredient in various food applications.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Freeze Dried Cranberry Powder 50mesh from Chaucer Foods Ltd is a finely ground powder obtained from cranberries that have been cut, freeze dried, and sieved to achieve a particle size of less than 50 mesh with a minimum of 90% passing before transport. This product retains the typical flavor and color characteristics of cranberries, although natural variations in raw materials may cause slight sensory differences. It has a moisture content of less than 5%, ensuring stability and quality. The powder is rich in dietary fiber (28.1g/100g), organic acids (29.5g/100g), and sugars (34.8g/100g), making it a nutritious ingredient. It is free from genetically modified organisms and common allergens, making it suitable for vegetarian, vegan, kosher, and halal diets. The product is microbiologically safe, with strict limits on microbial counts and no detectable Salmonella. Packaged in 7.5 kg PE bags, two of which are packed into a foil bag and then placed in a carton, it has a shelf life of 18 months when stored in airtight packaging below 25°C away from heat and sunlight. This freeze dried cranberry powder is ideal for use in food applications requiring natural cranberry flavor, color, and nutritional benefits, such as beverages, bakery products, dietary supplements, and confectionery.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: RSF-200 Bread Improver, manufactured by RIKEN VITAMIN CO.,LTD., is a yellowish white powder with a slight characteristic odor, designed to enhance the quality of wheat-based products. Composed primarily of mono- and diglycerides of fatty acids (E 471), sodium stearoyl lactylate (E 481), starch, and enzymes, this bread improver meets stringent specifications for identification and purity as set by FAO/WHO, EU, and US FDA. RSF-200 is free from genetically modified origins, ensuring a natural ingredient profile. It is recommended for use at 0.3 to 2.0% of flour weight, providing improved dough handling and bread quality. The product maintains a maximum loss on drying of 12%, with controlled microbiological limits and low heavy metal content, ensuring safety and consistency. With a shelf life of 12 months when stored in cool, shaded, and dry conditions, RSF-200 is packaged in 20 kg paper bags with inner PE bags for optimal preservation. Its balanced nutritional profile includes 632 kcal energy per 100g, with significant fat content primarily saturated, and minimal trans fats. RSF-200 is ideal for bakers seeking to improve bread texture, volume, and shelf life while adhering to regulatory standards.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GALACIN NISIN 101 NACL 2.5, LACIN 101 is a natural food antimicrobial product manufactured by Galactic S.A. through the fermentation of Lactococcus lactis. This product is presented as a white to light brown powder and contains an active ingredient, Nisin, at a concentration of 2.5 to 3.0% w/w, combined with a minimum of 90% sodium chloride. It is characterized by its heat resistance and non-dairy origin, making it suitable for a wide range of food preservation applications. The product exhibits a pH range of 2.9 to 3.8 in a 10% solution and maintains a potency of at least 1000 IU/mg, ensuring effective antimicrobial activity against pathogens and Gram-positive spoilage bacteria. GALACIN NISIN 101 NACL 2.5 is compliant with European regulations, is GRAS certified, and meets kosher and halal standards. It is also non-GMO, with strict limits on heavy metals and microbiological contaminants, ensuring safety and quality. The product is designed for use in food protection, extending shelf life and enhancing food safety, and should be stored unopened between 0 and 20°C in a dry, well-ventilated environment, with a shelf life of 24 months.

Rosemary Extract from Hunan Huacheng Biotech, Inc. is a fine brown yellow powder derived from the dried leaves of Rosmarinus officinalis L., sourced and manufactured in China. This 100% natural extract is obtained using water and ethanol as solvents, ensuring a high-quality product rich in active ingredients, primarily Rosmarinic acid (minimum 5%) and Carnosic acid (maximum 1%). The extract is characterized by its distinctive odor and taste, with a particle size where 95% passes through an 80 mesh sieve. It maintains strict quality controls including moisture content and ash levels not exceeding 8%, and complies with rigorous chemical and microbiological standards to ensure safety and purity, including limits on heavy metals and absence of harmful microorganisms. Certified Kosher, Halal, NON-GMO, FDA GRAS, USDA Organic, and holding multiple international quality certifications, this Rosemary Extract is suitable for use in food, nutraceutical, cosmetic, and pharmaceutical applications, offering antioxidant and preservative benefits. It is packed in secure paper drums with plastic liners, stored at room temperature away from direct sunlight, and has a shelf life of two years.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CURCUMIN NATURAL COLOUR from DÖHLER is a deep red viscous liquid designed as a natural coloring agent with a typical flavor and aroma reminiscent of freshly dried turmeric root. It is composed primarily of ethanol (35% to 45%) and glycerine (15% to 22%), ensuring a stable and consistent formulation. This product is allergen-free, GMO-free, and kosher suitable, making it versatile for various dietary requirements. With a specific gravity ranging from 0.968 to 1.008 and a refractive index between 1.410 and 1.450 at 20°C, it maintains quality and performance in applications. The flash point is 26°C, and it has a shelf life of 12 months when stored in a cool, dry, and well-ventilated place, protected from light and heat at temperatures not exceeding 20°C. All ingredients comply with the Australia and New Zealand Food Standards Code, ensuring safety and regulatory adherence. CURCUMIN NATURAL COLOUR is ideal for use in food and beverage products seeking natural turmeric-based coloring with added flavor and aroma benefits.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Cheddar Cheese Powder Hi Flavour from Ballantyne Foods Pty Ltd is an uncoloured, creamy white powder characterized by a strong, well-rounded cheddar cheese flavor profile that delivers savory and umami notes. This smooth, free-flowing powder contains cheese solids derived from pasteurized milk, salt, starter culture, and enzymes, along with milk solids, salt, and lactic acid as an acidity regulator. With a moisture content capped at 4.0% and salt content around 5.5% ± 1.5%, it ensures consistent quality and flavor intensity. The product is microbiologically safe, with low total plate counts and no detection of pathogens such as Salmonella or Listeria. Packaged in 20 kg polylined multiwall bags, it has a shelf life of 18 months when stored in a cool, dry place below 25°C. Ideal for enhancing sauces, soups, snack coatings, convenience meals, biscuit fillings, and icings, this cheddar cheese powder offers versatility and robust flavor enhancement. It is Halal certified, made in Australia, and free from genetically modified organisms according to FSANZ standards.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: PHOSKADENT® SF is a dental grade chemical product manufactured by BK Giulini GmbH, a company of the ICL group. It is a white powder composed primarily of sodium fluoride, with a high content of NaF ranging from 98.0 to 102.0%. The product exhibits a pH value between 8.0 and 12.0 in a 1% solution and contains minimal impurities, with arsenic levels not exceeding 3 ppm and heavy metals (as Pb) capped at 30 ppm. PHOSKADENT® SF has a bulk density of approximately 1100 g/l and is water soluble, making it suitable for incorporation into oral care formulations. Its primary application is the fluoridation of oral care products, contributing to dental health by providing fluoride ions. The product is supplied in 25 kg PE-lined paper bags, with other packaging options available upon request. For optimal preservation, it should be stored in a cool, dry place away from moisture. Safety measures as outlined in the safety data sheet must be observed during handling and use. PHOSKADENT® SF is valued for its purity, consistent quality, and effectiveness in dental applications, making it a reliable choice for manufacturers of oral care products seeking to enhance fluoride content.

SUPPLIER_NAME: Compañía Española de Algas Marinas S.A. (CEAMSA)
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CEAMTEX 1602 C is an alginate-based product manufactured by Compañía Española de Algas Marinas S.A. (CEAMSA). It is a white to beige powder derived from sodium alginate (E-401), a natural hydrocolloid extracted from brown seaweeds. This product is standardized to ensure uniform performance and is specifically developed for water applications. It is soluble in both cold and hot water but insoluble in vegetable oils, minerals, and organic solvents. CEAMTEX 1602 C forms gels in cold water and milk when combined with a calcium source, making it suitable for various gelling applications. The typical dosage ranges from 0.2% to 3%. The product features a fine particle size, with 98% of the gum below 250 microns, and meets strict safety and purity standards, including low heavy metal content and absence of pathogens such as E. coli and Salmonella. It is packed in an inner polyethylene bag and an outer paper bag, with a shelf life of at least 24 months when stored in a cool, dry place under recommended conditions (max 25ºC, 60% RH). CEAMTEX 1602 C complies with international standards for identity and purity, making it a reliable choice for food and industrial applications requiring natural hydrocolloids.

CHOLINACTIVE P30 IP is a non-GMO deoiled lecithin product enriched with 30% phosphatidylcholine, derived from soya. It appears as a yellow to light brown powder and is certified IP by Food Chain ID, HALAL, and KOSHER, ensuring high quality and compliance with various dietary standards. This product serves as an effective emulsifier (E322) and is suitable for use as a food supplement. Its composition includes a minimum of 95% acetone insolubles, 30% phosphatidylcholine, 12-16% phosphatidylinositol, 9-14% phosphatidylethanolamine, and 3-6% phosphatidic acid, making it a rich source of phospholipids. CHOLINACTIVE P30 IP meets stringent physico-chemical and bacteriological specifications, including low peroxide and acid values, minimal moisture content, and absence of harmful microorganisms such as E. coli and Salmonella. Heavy metal content is kept well below regulatory limits, ensuring safety for consumption. Packaged in 20 kg or 2x10 kg polyethylene bags within cardboard boxes, it has a shelf life of 24 months when stored in a cool, dry place. Recognized as GRAS in the United States and compliant with European food additive regulations, CHOLINACTIVE P30 IP is ideal for food industry applications requiring high-quality lecithin with enhanced phosphatidylcholine content.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: VANILLA EXTRACT 45% VOL from AROMATECH SAS is a brown liquid characterized by its distinctive vanilla odor and taste. It contains 45% volumic alcoholmetric content, derived from ethyl alcohol food grade and inverted sugar, both sourced from organic farming. This vanilla extract is designed exclusively for industrial use as a flavoring agent in the food industry, complying with European regulation 1334/2008/EC. The product is microbiologically stable, free from genetically modified organisms (GMO), and does not contain any major allergens. It is suitable for kosher, vegetarian, and vegan diets, though not halal. The extract has a shelf life of 12 months and should be stored at ambient temperature between +15°C and +25°C, away from light, heat, and moisture. Its compliance with contaminant regulations ensures safety and quality, making it an excellent choice for enhancing flavor profiles in various food applications.

PRODUCT_NAME: PUREFLEX Chondroitin Sulfate Sodium USP Bovine Source
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: PUREFLEX Chondroitin Sulfate Sodium USP Bovine Source is a high-quality, creamy white powder derived from bovine cartilage, manufactured by TSI Group Ltd. This product contains no additives or preservatives, ensuring purity and safety for various applications. It meets stringent USP monograph standards with a chondroitin sulfate sodium content ranging from 90.0% to 105.0% (odb), and exhibits a low, characteristic odor. The powder has a bulk density of not less than 0.5 g/mL and a controlled particle size distribution, with 100% passing through an 850 micron sieve, at least 85% through a 425 micron sieve, and 30-70% through a 75 micron sieve. Analytical specifications include clarity not more than 0.35, specific rotation between -20.0° and -30.0°, moisture content (loss on drying) not exceeding 10%, pH between 5.5 and 7.5, residue on ignition between 20% and 30%, and limits on chloride, sulfate, protein, heavy metals, and mercury well within USP and Ph. Eur. standards. The product also meets electrophoretic purity requirements and is microbiologically controlled with limits on total aerobic count, yeast and mold, and absence of E. coli and Salmonella. Due to its hygroscopic nature, it requires careful handling and storage in unopened containers under ambient temperature, with a retest period exceeding three years. PUREFLEX Chondroitin Sulfate Sodium USP is supplied in 25 kg double poly-lined fiber drums, making it suitable for pharmaceutical, nutraceutical, and cosmetic applications where high purity and consistent quality are essential.

Masala Tea Unsweetened from Haldin Pacific Semesta, PT is a finely powdered blend of multiple traditional natural ingredients, including spices and tea, designed to deliver an aromatic and flavorful experience. This product features a warm, slightly floral spice aroma and an unsweetened tea taste that is creamy, astringent, and warming, making it ideal for consumption in cold weather. The tea powder is brown in color and soluble in water, with a pH range of 5.9 to 7.1 and a Brix value between 9.5 and 12, indicating its soluble solids content. It contains a maximum moisture content of 8%, ensuring good shelf stability. The product meets stringent microbiological standards, including limits on total plate count, yeast and mold, and absence of E-coli, coliform, and Salmonella, ensuring safety and quality. Heavy metal content is controlled within safe limits, including arsenic, lead, copper, cadmium, and mercury. Recommended for use in beverages at an 11% solution concentration, Masala Tea Unsweetened is best stored in a sealed container in a cool, dry place away from direct heat or light, with a shelf life of 12 months before opening. This product is well-suited for those seeking a natural, unsweetened spiced tea with traditional flavors and health-conscious attributes.

COMPOSITIONS: ['Matricaria recutita L. (German Chamomile) flower extract', 'Water (extraction solvent)', 'Wheat maltodextrin (carrier)', 'Total apigenin 7-glucoside (indicative content)', 'Alpha-bisabolol (indicative content)']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GERMAN CHAMOMILE FL 4:1 DE PR605 from PLANTEX is a powdered extract derived from the flowers of Matricaria recutita L., commonly known as German chamomile. The extract is prepared with a 4:1 ratio of plant material to final extract using water as the extraction solvent and wheat maltodextrin as a carrier. The powder ranges in color from beige to brown and its solubility depends on the degree of incorporation. This product contains indicative levels of total apigenin 7-glucoside and alpha-bisabolol, key bioactive compounds known for their soothing and anti-inflammatory properties. It complies with stringent quality standards including limits on heavy metals, pesticides, and microbial contamination, ensuring safety and purity. The extract is free from GMOs, TSE/BSE substances, and has not been ionized. With a shelf life of 24 months, it should be stored in a dry, light-protected environment at 5 to 25°C. This German chamomile extract is ideal for use in natural health products, cosmetics, and dietary supplements where calming and skin-soothing benefits are desired.
RECOMMENDED_HEALTH_BENEFITS: ['Anti-aging, Antioxidant, Anti-Cancer, Anti-Inflammatory', 'Botanicals', 'General Health', 'Immune system', 'Skin, Nails, Hair', 'Women and Men wellness']

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GELLAN GUM is a hydrophilic polysaccharide produced by Pseudomonas syringae through pure culture and carbohydrate fermentation. It appears as an off-white flowing powder with excellent dispersibility, temperature resistance, and suspension properties. This versatile gum can form its own soft and elastic gel, functioning as a thickener, gelling agent, and stabilizer within a single hydrophilic colloid. It dissolves readily in water to create a viscous solution and passes both calcium and sodium ion gel tests, indicating strong gel-forming capabilities. GELLAN GUM is particularly suitable for use in UHT and HTST neutral dairy beverages such as chocolate milk, cafe latte, milk tea, and nutritional dairy drinks. The recommended additive amount ranges from 0.025% to 0.035%. Its purity ranges from 85.0% to 108.0%, with controlled moisture, ash content, and low levels of heavy metals and microbial contaminants, ensuring safety and quality. Packaged in food-grade PE bags within paper barrels, it has a shelf life of 24 months when stored unopened at room temperature. This product is ideal for enhancing texture, stability, and suspension in various food and beverage applications, making it a valuable ingredient in the dairy industry and beyond.

COMPOSITIONS: ['Modified potato starch', 'Acetylated Distarch Phosphate (E1414)', 'Starch Sodium Octenyl Succinate (E1450)']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CheeseMaker CF30 is an application-specific solution developed by KMC, made from modified potato starch, specifically acetylated distarch phosphate (E1414) and starch sodium octenyl succinate (E1450). It appears as a white powder with a moisture content of up to 18.5% and a pH range of 4.5 to 7.5 when measured in a starch-water solution. Designed primarily for vegan cheese alternatives, especially sliced cheese, CheeseMaker CF30 is applied at a dosage of 19-21%. The product is non-GMO, non-allergenic, and produced in facilities certified with ISO 22000 and BRC standards, with halal and kosher certifications available upon request. It offers excellent microbiological safety with strict limits on coliform bacteria, E. coli, Salmonella, Listeria monocytogenes, and other pathogens, as well as controlled levels of heavy metals like lead and arsenic. Nutritionally, it is low in fat and protein, contains no sugar, and provides a high carbohydrate content mainly from starch. Its shelf life is three years when stored in a dry, cool place away from strong odors. CheeseMaker CF30 is ideal for food manufacturers seeking a reliable, safe, and high-quality starch-based ingredient to create vegan cheese products with desirable texture and stability.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: CheeseMaker CF30 is applied in a dosage of 19-21%.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: RP Maracaibo 65% is a special dark chocolate customized for Akutagawa, produced by Max. Felchlin A.G in Switzerland. This product is presented in a solid chocolate form, packaged as a bulk type in 1kg bags with outer packaging made of PE and paper. It is designed to be stored under 18°C to maintain its quality and has a shelf life of 24 months. The chocolate contains milk and almond, with almond contamination noted, making it important for consumers with allergies to these ingredients to exercise caution. RP Maracaibo 65% is characterized by its rich chocolate taste and is suitable for various culinary applications where high-quality dark chocolate is desired. The product undergoes strict microbiological testing to ensure safety, adhering to standards such as ISO-4833-1 for total plate count and ISO-21527-1/2 for mold. This chocolate is ideal for professional use in confectionery and baking, offering a premium ingredient for creating exquisite chocolate products.

PRODUCT_NAME: FARINA PROTEICA DI NOCI BIOLOGICA / ORGANIC WALNUT PROTEIN POWDER
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: FARINA PROTEICA DI NOCI BIOLOGICA / ORGANIC WALNUT PROTEIN POWDER is a finely milled powder obtained by mechanically concentrating the protein content from organic shelled walnuts (Juglans Regia) without the use of solvents or chemical extraction methods. This product features a high protein content ranging from 35% to 50% and a low fat content between 6% and 13%, which enhances its stability against oxidation compared to traditional whole walnut flours. The powder exhibits a color spectrum from light beige to dark brown and retains the natural, raw walnut flavor without roasting. Its complete amino acid profile makes it highly versatile for developing protein blends and functional food products. It is ideal for enriching bakery items such as bread, pizza, cookies, and energy bars, adding both nutritional value and flavor. The product is certified organic under EU regulation 2018/848, kosher certified, free from pesticides, GMOs, heavy metals, aflatoxins, and nano particles, and complies with vegan, halal, lactose-free, and latex-free standards. It is microbiologically safe with strict limits on microbial counts and is packaged in multiple paper bags or polypropylene big bags, ensuring preservation under controlled storage conditions. With a shelf life of 18 months when stored properly, this organic walnut protein powder is a premium ingredient for food and supplement industries seeking high-quality plant-based protein sources.
